name: Boxing Game
description:
Controls: Attacking:

W -> Top punch; Heavy damage, costs a lot of stamina, slow.

A-> Left punch; Average damage, average stamina cost, average speed.

S-> Low punch; Low damage, low stamina cost, fast speed. Cannot be dodged, if the enemy blocks this, you will be stunned.

D-> Right punch; Average damage, average stamina cost, average speed.

Left Shift / Space -> If timed during the start of an attack, it will feint. Causing the attack to cancel early.

Defending:

Up Arrow -> Hold to block. Blocks all incoming attacks at the cost of taking stamina damage.

Left Arrow -> Dodge left; will only dodge left attacks.

Down Arrow -> Dodge down; will only dodge top attacks.

Right Arrow -> Dodge right; will only dodge right attacks.

Any successful dodges will make the attacker stunned and lose stamina.

Other Information:
  • Statuses
    • Tired: After losing 80% stamina, the player will be tired. Reducing their stamina regeneration until it restores a certain threshold.
    • Stunned: Can be applied many ways. When stunned, player cannot do any inputs and will cancel any in-progress inputs.
